00011 
00012 #include "Object.h"
00013 #include "Iterable.h"
00014 #include "Hashable.h"

00016 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00017 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00018 
00034 template<class T>
00035 class Collection : public Iterable<T>, public Hashable {
00036 public:
00037 
00038     virtual bool add(const T & t);
00039     virtual bool addAll(const Collection<T> & c);
00040     virtual void clear();
00041     virtual bool contains(const T & t) const = 0;
00042     virtual bool containsAll(const Collection<T> & c) const;
00043     virtual bool operator ==(const Collection<T> & c) const;
00044 
00045     virtual bool operator !=(const Collection<T> & c) const {
00046         return !(*this == c);
00047     }
00048     virtual sint hashCode() const = 0;
00049     virtual bool empty() const = 0;
00050     virtual bool remove(const T & t);
00051     virtual bool removeAll(const Collection<T> & c);
00052     virtual bool retainAll(const Collection<T> & c);
00053     virtual std::size_t size() const = 0;
00054     virtual Array<T> toArray() const = 0;
00055 
00056     virtual Iterator iterator() const = 0;
00057     virtual MutableIterator mutableIterator() = 0;
00058 
00059     operator Array<T>() const {
00060         return toArray();
00061     }
00062 
00063     virtual Collection & operator<<(const T& t) { add(t); return *this; }
00064 };
00065 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00066 
00067 #endif  /* COLLECTION_H_ */
